mapper.select:
select parse_time, sum(parse_total_cnt) as parse_total_cnt, sum(parse_success_cnt) as parse_success_cnt, sum(net_out_parse_flow_total) as net_out_parse_flow_total, sum(net_out_parse_total_cnt) as net_out_parse_total_cnt, sum(net_in_parse_total_cnt) as net_in_parse_total_cnt, sum(within_parse_total_cnt) as within_parse_total_cnt, sum(without_parse_total_cnt) as without_parse_total_cnt from ${queryParam.queryTable} rrpdc
group by parse_time order by parse_time

select count(*) from (select rrpdc.cname from (select cname from ${queryParam.cnameQueryTable} as rrpdc
and 1 = 2
group by cname ) as rrpdc left join (select domain_name from dim.dim_dial_domain_record group by domain_name) as dddr on rrpdc.cname = dddr.domain_name
and (dddr.domain_name is not null and dddr.domain_name != '')
and (dddr.domain_name is null or dddr.domain_name = '')
)

select rrpdc.*, dddr.domain_name as dial_domain_name, if(dial_domain_name is null or dial_domain_name = '', '未下发', '已下发') as distribute_state from (select cname, sum(parse_total_cnt) as parse_total_cnt, sum(parse_success_cnt) as parse_success_cnt, sum(parse_flow_total) as parse_flow_total, sum(net_out_parse_flow_total) as net_out_parse_flow_total, sum(net_out_parse_total_cnt) as net_out_parse_total_cnt, sum(net_in_parse_flow_total) as net_in_parse_flow_total, sum(net_in_parse_total_cnt) as net_in_parse_total_cnt, sum(within_parse_total_cnt) as within_parse_total_cnt, sum(without_parse_total_cnt) as without_parse_total_cnt, sum(cdn_parse_total_cnt) as cdn_parse_total_cnt, sum(idc_parse_total_cnt) as idc_parse_total_cnt from ${queryParam.cnameQueryTable} as rrpdc
and 1 = 2
group by cname order by ${queryParam.orderBy} ) as rrpdc left join (select domain_name from dim.dim_dial_domain_record group by domain_name) as dddr on rrpdc.cname = dddr.domain_name
and (dddr.domain_name is not null and dddr.domain_name != '')
and (dddr.domain_name is null or dddr.domain_name = '')
limit #{queryParam.limit}
offset #{queryParam.offset}

select rrpdc.cname as domain_name, dddr.domain_name as dial_domain_name, if(dial_domain_name is null or dial_domain_name = '', '未下发', '已下发') as distribute_state, parse_total_cnt, parse_success_cnt, parse_flow_total, net_out_parse_flow_total, net_out_parse_total_cnt, net_in_parse_flow_total, net_in_parse_total_cnt, within_parse_total_cnt, without_parse_total_cnt, cdn_parse_total_cnt, idc_parse_total_cnt from ( select cname, sum(parse_total_cnt) as parse_total_cnt, sum(parse_success_cnt) as parse_success_cnt, sum(parse_flow_total) as parse_flow_total, sum(net_out_parse_flow_total) as net_out_parse_flow_total, sum(net_out_parse_total_cnt) as net_out_parse_total_cnt, sum(net_in_parse_flow_total) as net_in_parse_flow_total, sum(net_in_parse_total_cnt) as net_in_parse_total_cnt, sum(within_parse_total_cnt) as within_parse_total_cnt, sum(without_parse_total_cnt) as without_parse_total_cnt, sum(cdn_parse_total_cnt) as cdn_parse_total_cnt, sum(idc_parse_total_cnt) as idc_parse_total_cnt from ${queryParam.cnameQueryTable} as rrpdc
and concat(domain_name, cname) in
#{item}
group by rrpdc.cname ) as rrpdc left join (select domain_name from dim.dim_dial_domain_record group by domain_name) as dddr on rrpdc.cname = dddr.domain_name

select rrpdc.domain_name as domain_name, rrpdc.cname as cname, dddr.domain_name as dial_domain_name, if(dial_domain_name is null or dial_domain_name = '', '未下发', '已下发') as distribute_state, parse_total_cnt, parse_success_cnt, parse_flow_total, net_out_parse_flow_total, net_out_parse_total_cnt, net_in_parse_flow_total, net_in_parse_total_cnt, within_parse_total_cnt, without_parse_total_cnt, cdn_parse_total_cnt, idc_parse_total_cnt from (select arrayJoin(splitByChar(';', #{domainNames}) ) as domain) domain_table inner join (select domain_name, cname, sum(parse_total_cnt) as parse_total_cnt, sum(parse_success_cnt) as parse_success_cnt, sum(parse_flow_total) as parse_flow_total, sum(net_out_parse_flow_total) as net_out_parse_flow_total, sum(net_out_parse_total_cnt) as net_out_parse_total_cnt, sum(net_in_parse_flow_total) as net_in_parse_flow_total, sum(net_in_parse_total_cnt) as net_in_parse_total_cnt, sum(within_parse_total_cnt) as within_parse_total_cnt, sum(without_parse_total_cnt) as without_parse_total_cnt, sum(cdn_parse_total_cnt) as cdn_parse_total_cnt, sum(idc_parse_total_cnt) as idc_parse_total_cnt from ${queryParam.cnameQueryTable} as rrpdc
group by rrpdc.domain_name, rrpdc.cname order by ${queryParam.orderBy}, rrpdc.domain_name ) rrpdc on domain_table.domain = rrpdc.domain_name left join (select domain_name from dim.dim_dial_domain_record group by domain_name) as dddr on rrpdc.cname = dddr.domain_name
